import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Download File"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/signature_request/files/{signature_request_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint is soon to be deprecated and will be removed in a future version.
        
Please use the new **[Get Signature Request File](/api/get-signature-request-file)** endpoint instead, which provides more flexibility with file type selection and better error handling.

:::

Obtain the file of the Signature Request by id. Returns a PDF file.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"signature_request_id","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"ID of the Signature Request to get"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Expected response to a valid request","content":{"application/pdf":{"schema":{"type":"string","format":"binary"}}}},"4xx":{"description":"Unexpected error","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["error_code","error_message"],"properties":{"error_code":{"type":"string"},"error_message":{"type":"string"}},"title":"Error"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
